title: Legal Updates and Newsletter Themes
summary: The newsletter discusses expanding office locations, implementing circuit riding for public records requests, correcting a legal requirement regarding five-day letters, exploring municipal roundtable funding sources, and detailing the procedure for retainage payments.
topics: Public Records, Legal Updates, Public Works, Fire Department Practice Areas, Public Service
compressed_content: New office locations in Gig Harbor and Pierce County. Implementation of circuit riding for public records requests. Correction on the PRA five-day letter requirement. Discussion on municipal roundtables and funding sources. Details on retainage payment procedures.
search_text: Fireho Volume 15 Number Six, Public Records Act, five-day letter, PRA Case Rufin v. City of Seattle, Circuit Riding Implementation, Municipal Roundtable Funding Sources, Retainage Payment Procedure
